-- 给属性创建直方图
```sql
    ANALYZE TABLE cast_info UPDATE HISTOGRAM ON movie_id WITH 100 BUCKETS; 
```

-- 查看直方图信息
```sql
    SELECT * FROM information_schema.column_statistics
    WHERE SCHEMA_NAME = "imdb"
    AND table_name = "cast_info"
    AND column_name = "movie_id";
```
